title: To extend to the Mayor of the District of Columbia the same authority with respect to the National Guard of the District of Columbia as the Governor of a State exercises with respect to the National Guard of that State.
content: Amends the District of Columbia code to make the Mayor of the District of Columbia the Commander-in-Chief of the militia of the District with jurisdiction over: (1) the reserve corps, (2) the appointment of commissioned officers, (3) the call for duty, and (4) general courts-martial.
